message: I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a great opportunity to get a fantastic deal.
Thanks for the offer, Alice. I appreciate you trying to work with me. I'm really hoping to get a better deal, so I'd be happy to pay $130 for the product.
I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. How about $138 for the product?
Alice, I appreciate you coming down in price. I'm still not quite there yet.  $135 is the best I can do right now. Let's see if we can close this deal.
I'm getting close to my minimum price, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. How about $139 for the product?
